member.name: T:Microsoft.DirectX.AudioVideoPlayback.Audio

member.name: M:Microsoft.DirectX.AudioVideoPlayback.Audio.#ctor(System.String)

member.name: M:Microsoft.DirectX.AudioVideoPlayback.Audio.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the object and opens an audio file for playback, and optionally starts playback.
member.param: Specifies the name of the file.
Set to true to automatically start playback. Set to false to open the file but not play it.
